sense.def:
Kadar igralec ali igralka
portrays someone
, igra neko osebo v gledališki igri ali filmu.

seg.quote: In her final sketch she portrayed a temperamental countess.

sense.def:
To portray someone or something in a particular way
pomeni opisati ali upodobiti nekoga ali nekaj na določen način, na primer v knjigi ali filmu.

seg.quote: Advertising tends to portray women in a very traditional role.
